::Hakibuscon::

       Hakibuscon was laying by a tree.  He looked back at the Ark.  More battle.  He had a burning anxiety to fight, but he wasn't in fighting condition.  He held his shoulder.  He kept crawling forward.  He was helpless, defenceless.  He kept going hoping for someone to find him.  He had one choice, he could go to the faction called the Alliance.
